Label.text: There are still open orders.
Please answer all mandatory store surveys. #questions#
Please answer all mandatory POS Surveys. #questions#
Please answer all mandatory store questions. #questions#
Please answer all mandatory POS questions. #questions#
Please choose a visit time that is within the visiting periods defined for this business partner's opening time.
Please enter a Time Thru greater than Time From.
Please enter a Visit Start Date earlier than Visit End Date.
Please enter a new call date that is compliant with the substitution time frame.
Please fill in all values.
The selected call is not editable.
A call of a substituted user cannot be created outside of the substitution time frame.
The selected call type cannot be used for a customer.
Please select a customer.
The asset can be registered only via bar code scanner.
Max number of pictures reached for this call.
We’ve adjusted the image to the configured maximum values. Contact your system admin for details.
Something’s not right with the image. Contact your system admin for details.
Location of the customer cannot be determined.
An active substitution is running for you and the selected customer. You are not allowed to create calls during the substitution time frame, if you are the substituted user.
Call duration must be greater than 0.
Looks like you’ve selected an invalid date. Select a date that’s between #minValue# and #maxValue#.
Looks like you’ve selected an invalid date. Select a date that's on or before today's date.
Looks like you’ve selected an invalid date. Select a date that's on or after today's date.
Looks like you’ve selected an invalid date. Select today's date.
A call must not span several days.
Due to active orders present, this call cannot be deleted.
Call cannot be created without selecting call template.
The management relation of the customer is not valid for the date of the call.
You’re outside the coverage area for this visit. Ensure that you’re within the coverage area and try again.
We couldn’t determine the coverage area for this visit. Start the visit anyway?
We couldn’t determine the coverage area for this visit. Complete the visit anyway?
You’re outside the coverage area for this visit. Start the visit anyway?
You’re outside the coverage area for this visit. Complete the visit anyway?
Another visit #subject# (#date#) is already in progress. Cancel or complete this visit before you start another visit.
